name: PHPlot

screenshots.caption: 3. Stacked bar plot with linepoints plot overlay
6. Linepoints plot with data labels and lines

short_description: PHPlot is a PHP graphics class for creating charts and plots.  It works with PHP5 and the PHP GD extension to produce PNG, GIF, or JPEG images.  TrueType fonts (TTF) are optional, or built-in GD fonts can be used.  The available plot types include: area, bars, line/points, lines, pie, points, squared, stacked-bars, and thin bar-line.  Labels, tick marks, plot legend, and X/Y axes and more are all configurable. Images can be imported as a background, multiple graphs can be drawn on one image, and images can be saved to disk or returned to a browser.
summary: A PHP class for creating graphs, plots, charts
